institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Industry-led youth customized training business operation rules/Article 20 (On-site monitoring and consulting)
contents: Article 20 (Conducting on-site monitoring and consulting) ① The Chairman may have the Corporation headquarters or branches/branches conduct on-site monitoring in accordance with Article 17 (5) of the Operation Regulations. In this case, the person in charge of the corporation must check the status of government-supported facilities, equipment, and training implementation, etc., considering the results of the business plan review and guidance inspection for the project group. ② The chairman may form a consulting group comprised of officials from the Ministry of Employment and Labor and experts in the relevant industry to provide consulting on training. ③ The business group must actively cooperate with the Corporation’s monitoring and consulting.
